column3: 1 whisk-In a mixing bowl, whisk 1 cup of chilled curd until smooth. Use fresh homemade or packaged curd
2 Add-Add 1 teaspoon of cumin powder to the bowl
3 add-add 1 tablespoon of chopped cilantro leaves to the bowl
5 Add-1/2 teaspoon of chaat masala powder to the bowl
6 Add-1/4 teaspoon salt to the bowl
8 Add-1/4 teaspoon of red chilli powder to the bowl
9 chop or grate-chop or grate the cucumber
10 Add-Add the chopped or grated cucumber to the whisked curd
11 Combine-Combine all the ingredients in the bowl
